title: Tyrell Fortune meets Azunna Anyanwu on Bellator 233 main card
text:
Tyrell Fortune has his opponent for next month’s Bellator 233 event.

Fortune (7-0 MMA, 7-0 BMMA), the undefeated heavyweight prospect, will meet Azunna Anyanwu (15-5 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) on the main card of the event, MMA Junkie today confirmed with a Bellator official.

Bellator 233 takes place Nov. 8 at WinStar World Casino & Resort in Thackerville, Okla. The main card airs on Paramount following prelims on MMA Junkie.

Fortune, who has competed in all of his career fights under the Bellator banner, was originally linked to a matchup with Tim Johnson for the event. The fight was not finalized, though, and instead the promotion matched him up with Anyanwu.

Anyanwu, a veteran of UFC and Dana White’s Contender Series, will return to Bellator for the first time in more then eight years. He fought once for the promotion in September 2011, scoring a second-round TKO at Bellator 49.

In other Bellator 233 news, Christian Edwards (1-0 MMA, 1-0 BMMA) will not fight replacement opponent Cesar Bennett (0-0 MMA, 0-0 BMMA) on the preliminary card.

The latest Bellator 233 lineup now includes:

MAIN CARD (Paramount, DAZN, 9 p.m. ET)

John Salter vs. Costello van Steenis

Andrew Kapel vs. Muhammed Lawal

Azunna Anyanwu vs. Tyrell Fortune

Arlene Blencowe vs. Leslie Smith

PRELIMINARY CARD (MMA Junkie, 6:45 p.m. ET)

Cesar Bennett vs. Christian Edwards

Kyle Crutchmer vs. Antonio Jones

Julius Anglickas vs. Jordan Young

Romero Cotton vs. Jason Perrotta

Amanda Bell vs. Janay Harding

Davion Franklin vs. Odell Pantin

Sean Clements vs. Aaron McKenzie

Lucas Brennan vs. Jacob Landin

Jimmy Lugo vs. Grant Neal
description: Tyrell Fortune has his opponent for next month's Bellator 233 event.
